### Tender Details

*   **Publication Date:** 2023-02-27
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-19 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

*   **Service Categories:**
    *   Building and facility maintenance and repair services
    *   Residential building construction services
    *   Single family dwelling construction services
    *   General building construction
    *   Residential construction

### Background

The Bethune Memorial House, a National Historic Site located in Gravenhurst, Ontario, requires urgent restoration of its building envelope. Originally constructed in 1879-1880, the two-storey timber structure boasts a stone foundation, clapboard exterior, brick chimneys, and a steep pitched gable cedar shingle roof. Preservation of the cultural defining elements is of utmost importance and requires careful consideration.

Parks Canada has been working closely with the Federal Heritage Building Review Office to ensure compliance with review and approval standards for this project. This two-stage selection process invites qualified suppliers to provide further qualifications and financial bids based on specifications and drawings.

### Eligibility Criteria

To participate in this tender, suppliers must have demonstrated qualifications and capabilities during the Stage 1 evaluation. Those who have been pre-qualified will be invited to offer further qualifications and financial proposals.
